update T_MERCHANT_SHOP
ORG_ID = #{ORG_ID},
PARENT_ID = #{PARENT_ID},
TREE_PATH = #{TREE_PATH},
MERCHANT_ID = #{MERCHANT_ID},
SHOP_CODE = #{SHOP_CODE},
SHOP_NAME = #{SHOP_NAME},
SHOP_SHORT_NAME = #{SHOP_SHORT_NAME},
TYPE = #{TYPE},

DISTRICT_ID = #{DISTRICT_ID},

where ID = #{ID}
